snippet: Fifty people have been accused of conspiring to sell the identities of hundreds of Puerto Ricans to illegal immigrants on the American mainland.
abstract: Fifty people have been accused of conspiring to sell the identities of hundreds of Puerto Ricans to illegal immigrants on the American mainland in what is the largest single fraud case ever for the Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency.
lead_paragraph: Fifty people have been accused of conspiring to sell the identities of hundreds of Puerto Ricans to illegal immigrants on the American mainland.

headline.seo: 50 Charged With Selling Identities of Puerto Ricans to Illegal Immigrants
headline.main: 50 Charged With Selling Identity Papers to Migrants
headline.print_headline: 50 Charged With Selling Identity Papers To Migrants
